blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Operation Ask Out
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2UxIe7R

by scrapsandbolts

Tony and Bucky both like each other, but they’re too oblivious to each other’s crushes. All of their friends grow tired of the two dancing around each other, hopelessly pining. So, to force the two to confess, they hatch a plot to get their idiot friends to go on a date. Will everything go according to plan when an unexpected event takes place?

Words: 1323, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 5 of Marvel Oneshots

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes, Steve Rogers, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Sharon Carter (Marvel), Justin Hammer
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Oblivious Tony Stark, Oblivious Bucky Barnes, Everyone is tired of their bs, Futile Planning, Cussing, But only a little


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2UxIe7R

blog.description: Batman, Say it fast. Really fast. As fast as you can. Over and over. So what do you hear? Badman. Bad. Man. Batman. Badman. To me... Now and forever... one and                                             the same. - Peter J. summary: Jogo Capitã Marvel: Secret Skrulls (Estilo BANG!)
title: Jogo Capitã Marvel: Secret Skrulls (Estilo BANG!)
body:
Mate o tempo até a estreia do novo filme da Capitã Marvel com este novo jogo de cartas da USAopoly.

O Captain Marvel: Secret Skrulls Gameé um jogo de identidade oculta baseado no universo cinemático da Marvel onde os jogadores assumem os papéis dos seus personagens favoritos da Marvel, incluindo a própria Capitã Marvel, para defender a Terra numa guerra intergaláctica contra os metamorfos…

blog.name: theartofthecover
blog.title: Ŧꃅᙍ ꍏ尺Ϯ Ծ₣ ੮ℌΣ Շ⊕√乇Ɽ
blog.description:
Art covers galore! A blog dedicated to showcase only the best comic book and non-comic book covers from different companies, both mainstream and indie. All art is credited and (usually) linked to artists' personal blogs. This blog is run by several people, who are more than happy to help you with anything. Requests & asks are always welcomed. Members:

Mister JJJ Comics (@misterjjjcomics)

MaxMarvel123 (@maxmarvel123)

Disclaimer: All credit goes to original owners, companies and creative teams.Thank you for stopping by!

summary: hii I don't know if you're taking requests now, but, could you do one of that Instagram thingy with sebastian with a Brazilian...
question: hii I don't know if you're taking requests now, but, could you do one of that Instagram thingy with sebastian with a Brazilian girl that she's showing him some places in Brazil, like this place called "beco do batman" (or "batman's alley") and he posts a picture (it could be only of an artwork) and he tags her thanking her for the tour and the fans go crazy.... anyways thank youuu
answer:
Hey love! I’m no longer taking any requests for Sebastian Stan.

But i have done similar ones in the past, check my masterlist ❤️

If you have another request with a different person feel free to send it in.

reblog.comment:

summary: so i ordered the cutest set of infinity war buttons and they’re finally here and oh lord i definitely didn’t buy enough...
body:
so i ordered the cutest set of infinity war buttons and they’re finally here and oh lord i definitely didn’t buy enough 😍

thanks, dean @deandraws!

here the link to dean’s etsy page if anyone’s interested in seeing/buying some of his other amazing artwork
